channel.title: How to make ::item command and others admin only
channel.description: Exactly what title sais!!! please help 508 server scaperune sorta different from rest

item.title: How to make ::item command and others admin only
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

Go into commands in IO and change the player rights. Don’t use that code he gave you, its for 317s. Revert it back to what it was or remove that piece of code from your file.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make ::item command and others admin only
item.dc:creator: @creaper1030 creaper1030
item.description:
@creaper1030 wrote:

i got an error in compile

thate if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)&& playerRights > 2) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”); } } else { c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”); }

doesnt work

item.title: How to make ::item command and others admin only
item.dc:creator: @Exussit Exussit
item.description:
@Exussit wrote:

[quote=“mrpopyman, post:4, topic:398913”]well then change it to this:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")&& playerRights > 2) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist."); } } else { c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))"); }[/quote]
He said it’s a 508 not a 317 -_-
The code base is completely different…

Read full topic
item.source: How to make ::item command and others admin only

item.title: How to make ::item command and others admin only
item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman
item.description:
@mrpopyman wrote:

well then change it to this:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")&& playerRights > 2) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist."); } } else { c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))"); }

Read full topic

item.title: How to make ::item command and others admin only
item.dc:creator: @NumberEleven NumberEleven
item.description:
@NumberEleven wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist."); } } else { c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))"); }

That might be everyone, try it out.

Read full topic
